results.title: #Global Hunger Crisis 2025: 10 Countries Worst Affected by Food
results.summary: A grim report from Business Connect India highlights the global hunger crisis in 2025, focusing on ten countries facing severe food insecurity due to conflict, climate change, and political instability. The article points out that "a hungry Somalian child, today, can find himself in a refugee camp, a war zone, or a boat in search of life," emphasizing the interconnectedness of global stability and humanitarian crises. While it encourages donations to organizations like WFP and Oxfam, Christians are reminded that true and lasting provision comes from God (Matthew 6:33), and we should seek His Kingdom first while helping those in need as led by the Holy Spirit.
